name: PTA Meeting

name: Spelling Bee Finals
description: Congratulations to our finalists for earning a spot in the next round! Please come out and cheer them on at the Los Alamitos Spelling Bee.

name: Yearbook Cover Contest
description: Entries due by February 23, 2026. Los Alamitos PTA is inviting all Los Alamitos 5th graders to enter their drawings in our Yearbook cover contest. 2 winners will be selected to be displayed on the front and back cover, by the Yearbook committee panel.

name: Four Seasons Fundraising Concert
description: The concert will feature the Castillero Middle School Orchestras, showcasing a high-quality program of classical and contemporary music. Guest performers will include two-time Grammy-winning jazz violinist Mads Tolling.

name: Galentine's Night Out
description: 45 minutes of strength training work out followed by bubbles at F45 Branham Park. This is a free event with a maximum of 30 people.

name: Math Kangaroo Competition
description: The Math Kangaroo competition is coming to Los Alamitos. Use the invitation code CASAN_J0017001@2026math to register.

name: Reading Lab Volunteers
description: The Reading Lab is a tutoring program for students who would benefit from extra help with fundamental reading skills. Volunteers are needed once a week on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, or Thursdays.
